meanings.definition: Being selective or particular in making choices.
meanings.sent1: She is very choosey when it comes to picking out clothes.
meanings.sent2: The choosey eater only likes to eat his food if it's prepared a certain way.
meanings.sent3: The choosey cat refused to drink water unless it was from a crystal bowl.
meanings.sent4: Her choosey nature when it comes to friends means she only surrounds herself with the best.
meanings.sent5: The choosey shopper spent hours comparing prices before deciding on a purchase.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to be picky or fussy in selecting something.
meanings.sent1: The choosey customer took a long time to decide on which flavor of ice cream to buy.
meanings.sent2: Being choosey about the quality of his work, he always strives for perfection.
meanings.sent3: The choosey toddler refused to wear any shoes that weren't sparkly.
meanings.sent4: Her choosey attitude towards movies meant she rarely found one she enjoyed.
meanings.sent5: The choosey artist would only use the finest brushes for her paintings.
